Reviews.Title: “Expect high quality of service”
Reviews.Author: LonelyGalaxy
Reviews.Content: We (me and my wife) stayed here for 2 weeks in November. This is a hotel where the staff is truly efficient and helpful. Me and my wife came down with food poisoning after having eaten some mexican food from a mall nearby and the hotel staff took good care of my us by helping with medicines and speecific food. Its an efficient business hotel. The only problem I had was with the Doctor that they had sent across for treating us Dr.Santiago Reyes, who fleeced us by asking for 2800 pesos just for giving some medicines on what was just a normal stomach infection. He said its for an injection, when I was telling them it is not required, simple antibiotics was enough. But that's Mexico for you, people can commit fraud at any moment so watch out. Apart from that incident we had a pleasant stay here with a truly warm and couteous staff.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel, good price”
Reviews.Author: Lanagoncalo
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice hotel. Staff is kind and food is very good. It is brand new, so decoration is very clean, suites are confortable. There is a Starbucks in the Reception.

Reviews.Title: “Fiesta inn insurgentes sur”
Reviews.Author: shahquaiyoom
Reviews.Content: Excellent location.very safe hotel, just hang around, there is Sanborns,SAKS 2 rest. Vips a block away. This winter and the rooms have heating and warms upto 72/73 F, quite comfortable.There are 2 things missing, specially lady customers. 1.A magnifying mirror in the bath room, and a small carpet of any sort in the room. Starbuck at the door.All room are equipped with Wi FI

Reviews.Title: “First time in Mexico City”
Reviews.Author: Poethunter
Reviews.Content: Traveled down for an overnight trip (business meeting) and wasn't sure what to expect. The hotel was very modern and European in style. It looked as though it had been furnished by IKEA. I was very pleased with the room, the bed, bathroom and cleanliness. The breakfast buffet was good (you can negotiate that as part of your room price if you ask ahead of time). WIFI is fee and supposedly accessible throughtout the hotel but my room was at the end of the corridor and I couldn't access the internet. There is no express checkout so allow yourself plenty of time to check out - it was painfully slow if you are used to checking out of US hotels.

HotelInfo.Name: Fiesta Inn Insurgentes Sur
HotelInfo.Address: Mercaderes No. 20 | Col. San Jose Insurgentes, Mexico City 03900, Mexico
